mapper.select: SELECT e.id, e.name, e.birthday, g.id AS g_id, g.name AS g_name, e.phone, e.email, e.password, e.address, e.admin, e.hiredate, d.id AS d_id, d.name AS d_name, d.contact AS d_contact, d.comments AS d_comments, es.id AS es_id, es.name AS es_name FROM order_employee AS oe LEFT JOIN employees AS e ON(oe.emp_id = e.id) LEFT JOIN departments AS d ON(e.dept_id = d.id) LEFT JOIN employee_states AS es ON (e.state_id = es.id) LEFT JOIN gender AS g ON(e.gender = g.id) WHERE oe.order_id = #{orderId}
